column4: There's packaged for detecting portscan, but is there something to block external portscanning?
No. You just cloak your ports.
I have IPCop with a cople of ports opened. And it's five numbers so it's not a common port.
Like I said, you can't block other people from port scanning.
I blocked respond to ping on all interfaces, I change in sshd_config so I can access from just one IP, and I set block all IP in deny. That should be a good start.
